opis: PRODAJA: Katnica, Poreč, 123m2 +230m2 okućnice Prodaje se katnica - dio dvojnog objekta. U prizemlju se nalaze dnevni boravak, terasa, kuhinja i blagovaonica, a na katu 3 spavaće sobe i terasa s pogledom prema moru. Okućnica je ukupne površine 230m2, a ispred kuće mogu parkirati 2 auta. Prodaje se namještena. Nalazi se na mirnoj lokaciji, dok istovremeno blizu moru i Poreču. Udaljena je 3,6 km od mora te manje od 5 minuta vožnje autom do centra Poreča. Vlasništvo uredno, moguće financiranje kreditom. Agencijska naknada za kupca iznosi 2% +PDV. FOR SALE: Two-story house, Poreč, 123m² + 230m² yard A two-story house, part of a semi-detached building is for sale. The ground floor consists of a living room, a terrace, a kitchen, and a dining area, while the upper floor has three bedrooms and a terrace with a sea view. The total yard area is 230m², with space for two cars to park in front of the house. The house is being sold fully furnished. It is located in a peaceful area while still being close to the sea and Poreč. The property is 3.6 km from the sea and less than a 5-minute drive to the center of Poreč. Ownership is in order, and mortgage financing is possible. The agency fee for the buyer is 2% + VAT. ID KOD AGENCIJE: 12001 PEX Avantgarde d.o.o. Mob: 0994888003 E-mail: info@pex-nekretnine.hr www.pex.hr
